Key Match Events: James Rodriguez created both goals in Colombia's 2-1 win over Paraguay
Attempt missed. Matías Rojas (Paraguay) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Ramón Sosa
Pre-Game Insights: James sparks Colombia in Copa opener win
